about_the_game:
"Sweet Home" has been transformed into a roguelite game.
Pick two weapons and set their unique skills.
Take down the monsters consumed by desire and liberate 'Cha Hyun Soo'.
As a fan of the original, you'll find a richer experience in "Sweet Home".
Harness the soul constantly challenging you and the random onslaughts of feelings at each stage.

DIVERSE WEAPON COMBAT

Have you ever felt limited with just the spear connected to a battery?
Well, fear not! Just like 'Jeong Jae Heon', 'Cha Hyun Soo' is here to wield a sword and slay monsters.
Experience the dance-like kicks, unleash fiery Dempseyroll with combat gloves made from tires, or wield a massive scythe modified from a spear!
Show off your own unique actions in battle!

UNIQUE MONSTERS

B... E... G... O... N... S... T... A... R... V... E...
Remember the woman next door who was always hungry due to her extreme dieting? Or the patient who was always low on blood?
From the beloved monsters in the webtoon "Sweet Home" to brand new horrifying creatures, there's a whole array of them waiting to make their appearance.
Who knows, this time, maybe even the security monster with a lawnmower won't harm anyone...?

EMOTIONS INTENSIFYING WITH BATTLE

As 'Cha Hyun Soo' plunges into the depths of extremity, his emotions surge.
Play as 'Cha Hyun Soo' painted with passionate love, fiery anger, and exhilarating pleasure akin to a solo performance.

EXPRESSION OF DESIRE

With each exploration of 'Green Home' and every monster defeated, fragments of 'desire' accumulate.
If you find a stage too challenging, expend the accumulated desires to unleash the hidden abilities of 'Cha Hyun Soo' as a semi-monster.
Don't just leave 'Cha Hyun Soo' as a semi-monster.
We know the overwhelming power of 'Cha Hyun Soo' when he becomes a monster.

If it were you, you could fully awaken 'Semi-Monster Cha Hyun Soo' into a 'Wolvermensch'. Never give up.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
